ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Song (parody): Closet Male
ygData.msgSnippet: Much applause and very funny!!!! :-) Mind you, have you seen some of those half-elf males when they re dressed up nice *swoon*  ;-) /em wolf-whistles --
ygData.messageBody:
Much applause and very funny!!!! :-)

Mind you, have you seen some of those half-elf males when they're
dressed up nice *swoon* ;-)

/em wolf-whistles

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (44)
Expert bard, novice brewer, hardened drinker and terrific flirt!

Mith Marr server

On Fri, 16 Jun 2000 16:51:10 -0400, "Gordon Hughes"
<ghughes@...> wrote:

>It's been a slow day (both at work and on the board, I've noticed), so I got
>round to finishing off another song.
>
>I thought it was funny how some guys react to the female Wood-Elf
>characters. /ooc comments and wolf-whistles abound, but do they really know
>who's at the other end of the keyboard...?
>
>When was the last time you heard a female player get all hot and bothered at
>the sight of any of the male character models?
